item.description:
Avid Learner | Empathy-driven | Problem-Solver | Data Viz - Lover

I am a data science professional with a humongous potential to learn emerging technologies and adapt to a new environment. I believe in lean methodologies, pragmatism facts, data-informed decisions, optimism and open mindsets. I like challenging arguments, exploring different ways of doing things, redesigning processes and systems in search of optimized performance.

I am actively looking for Fall 2020 Co-Op/ Full-time positions in one or more of the following domains: Machine Learning/Data Science, Data warehousing, Business Intelligence, Data Visualization, Operations Research, Supply Chain Analytics.

While I’m not into data science you will find me solving puzzles, traveling to new places and hitting the gym to kick-start my endorphins rush.
